snippet: A grand jury has indicted Craig Hicks, 46, of Chapel Hill, in the shooting deaths of a newlywed Muslim couple and the wife’s sister last week.
abstract: Grand jury in North Carolina indicts Craig Hicks in shooting deaths of Deah Shaddy Barakat, Yusor Mohammad Abu-Salha and Razan Mohammad Abu-Salha in Chapel Hill.
lead_paragraph: A grand jury has indicted Craig Hicks, 46, of Chapel Hill, in the shooting deaths of a newlywed Muslim couple and the wife’s sister last week.

headline.main: North Carolina: Jury Brings Three Murder Counts
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Jury Brings 3 Murder Counts
